      • parseDoc

        public static java.util.HashMap<java.lang.String,java.lang.String> parseDoc(java.lang.String filename)
        Parse a single file of ... tags and convert them into separate documents stored in the returned map. Or if there are no such tags, just add the whole document.
        Returns:
        a HashMap of document ids that are the keys and values which are the contents of each document

      • indexDocuments

        public static void indexDocuments(org.apache.lucene.index.IndexWriter writer,
                                  java.lang.String docDir)
        Recursively add all documents in the directory to the IndexWriter. Note that parseDoc() is called because each file actually contains multiple documents.
        Parameters:
        docDir - is the directory path to where documents are found
